Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur was getting bored. The situation inside the cave involing the two 
bots and Megatron made him nervous. He needed air and to stay out of the 
way. The scorpion and mouse made him sick, but he tried his best to mind his 
own business.

He walked towards the mouth of the cave. He looked behind his arms where 
small red wings were. He knew he was a flier. So he thought of doing what a 
flier usually did taht others couldn't. Use his air superiority to get away 
from it all. He lifted himself into the air, bending his long legs.

"Beast mode," he commanded to his activation code with his gruff voice. He 
flipped upside down, transforming to his beast mode, a red pterrorsaur. He 
flapped his fleshy wings, taking off higher. He used the faint up-drifts to 
gain altitude. He circled, extending his wing spand. He viewed the 
landscape, staying in the range of the Predacon cave. He saw a lake and a 
forest in the distance.
